snippet.title: Remothered: Broken Porcelain - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Remothered: Broken Porcelain will be coming to Xbox One, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, and Steam on August 25, 2020!

This summer, experience the most terrifying and gruesome horror game of the year. Investigate with new powers and do whatever it takes to stay alive in Remothered: Broken Porcelain, a continuation of the Remothered franchise.

Wishlist on Steam: modus.games/remothered 
Pre-order today: modus.games/remothered-preorder 
Learn more: remothered.com
Follow Us on Twitter: https://modus.games/twitter   
Like Us on Facebook: https://modus.games/facebook   
Join our Discord: https://modus.games/discord
